column8: BECIS is a leading Energy as a Service (EaaS) provider to high quality commercial and industrial customers. With the EaaS model, BECIS group leverages on its deep technical expertise and strong balance sheet to finance, develop, design, construct and operate onsite complex energy solutions through long-term contracts to help our industrial customers meet their energy cost reduction, sustainability, and resiliency goals. These solutions include onsite solar projects, bioenergy projects and various energy efficiency projects across geographies with significant presence in Thailand, Indonesia, India, Malaysia, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia and China. " Empower Our Future "! Together, we can make a positive impact on the environment! Job Title¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† : Feasibility Design Engineer Location¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† : Bangkok, Thailand This position will report to Feasibility Design Manager., working in Business Development Department, will have the opportunity to be exposed to various and challenging missions. Key Responsibilities Support the Sales team by preparing all technical, financial, and commercial-related materials to meet the needs of the prospects. Prepare answers to solar PV tenders. Conduct the technical studies (feasibility, preliminary design, etc.) including load profile analysis, PVSyst simulation, AutoCAD preliminary PV Layout, and all related calculations for solar PV power plants in self-consumption. Prepare and propose a business plan and a commercial offer based on the results of the technical feasibility studies. Prepare the commercial proposals in relation to the agreed business plan. Coordinate with sales team, attend technical clarification meetings with the prospects when needed. Coordinate with internal teams and subcontractors to request and follow-up on relevant tasks to be performed. Participate in regular internal meetings to discuss the status of projects, project resources, commercial and technical strategic approach, and other needs. Organize and maintain documents related to projects to ensure better follow-up, and compliance with ISO 9001 quality management system. Identify and assess the economic viability of new technologies. Qualifications/Skills/Experience Bachelor‚Äôs degree¬†of Electrical Engineer 1-2 years‚Äô experience in the same industry or related field Experience in Solar Energy is a plus. AutoCAD and SketchUp are required. Office Suite (Excel ‚Äì VBA is a plus, Word and PowerPoint). Problem-solving skills Communication ability with team and other department Adaptability, Autonomy, Self-reliance, Proactivity Curiosity and motivation to learn. Ability to communicate in English is a must. Benefits of Working with BECIS Opportunity to build a career with a growing organization that leads and drives new and innovative initiatives in renewable energy in Asia. Be part of a diverse, multinational, and multicultural team. Competitive salary and benefits package. As a job applicant, your personal data will be collected and used by us for the following purposes, and we may disclose your personal data to third parties where necessary for the following purposes: Assessing and evaluating your suitability for employment in any current or prospective position within the organization; and Verifying your identity and the accuracy of your personal details and other information provided. By submitting your application to us, you consent to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal data, and such consent will remain valid until such time it is being withdrawn by you in writing. BECIS is a strong advocate of workforce diversity, an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate based on any legally protected status or characteristic: Minority/Female/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Disability/Veteran.

Tencent Thailand offers unique opportunities to grow with an industry-leading company while enjoying the benefits of creating and starting new business. Currently, we are looking for a candidate in the role of Graphic Designer located in Bangkok, Thailand. Tencent Thailand is dedicated to developing internet platforms with quality content for our users‚Äô lifestyles making the online world safe, enjoyable, and educational. Our leading products include, but not limited to, Sanook.com the number 1 portal in Thailand, WeChat, and Tencent Games. At Tencent, we aim to fulfill the needs of our audiences, partners, and advertisers with diverse and innovative platforms. We seek highly motivated individuals to join us as we continue our journey to create new products, services, and opportunities in Thailand, a hub of innovation and business for Southeast Asia. Job Description/Scope: Create Key visual, digital graphics, layouts, landing page, logos and icons, illustrations, advertisements, and many other forms of visual communication.by using relevant design tools. Qualifications: Proven experience as a Graphic Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) Knowledge of social media platforms and their design requirements. Strong understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory. Excellent creativity and ability to generate innovative visual concepts. Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team. Detail-oriented, with the ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. Jobtitle: Brand Manager - Oysho and ZARA Home
column8: The Brand Manager is responsible for driving top line performance, full profit and loss accountability, consistent operational excellence and brand compliance across all stores. Ensure all team members are trained and developed to deliver the business plan and sales targets. Ensure a continuous review and update to all policies and procedures whilst ensuring compliance with Group Internal Audit guidelines and minimize business risk. Actively develops and implements strategic business plans to ensure a profitable business operation. The job holder is responsible for the customer experience within all stores to reflect the brand values and customer promise. Delivering Top Line Performance and Profitability Sets overall guidelines for margin exploitation by product area and ensures processes are established to analyze¬†margin deviation.¬†Develops a global commercial strategy (short, medium and long term). Defines the store layout through all product categories (adjacencies and product mix) according to brand guidelines. Setting and delivery of operational standards for all stores in visual merchandising, stock availability, customer service and security whilst ensuring brand integrity. Ensure all team members are trained and developed to deliver the business plan and sales targets. Financial & Business Planning Own and develop the brand operations strategy (Strategic Plan). Construct, implement, monitor and control the approved budget and operational costs for all stores. Enforce company operating procedures to maintain accurate inventory, system integrity and profit protection across all stores.¬†Drive cost saving initiatives and efficiencies throughout retail operations by challenging existing processes.¬†Working alongside GM-HR to ensure manpower costs are closely monitored and productivity levels maximized.¬†Review and where necessary revise and or amend the standard operating procedures as per business requirement and in line with Group Internal Audit.¬†Review all internal audit reports when published and support the store manager in compiling recommendations and updates to Group Internal Audit. Review all store internal audit reports and implement necessary corrective action required. Corporate & Brand Promote brand and corporate values throughout the operations team. Ensure consistent ways of working across all stores.¬†Ensure stores comply with all legislation, regulation and corporate governance. Regularly and proactively communicates with the brand to establish and maintain a strong working relationship and partnership.¬†In partnership with the brand, work with the principle to resolve issues and deliver opportunities for the delivery of current and future commercial priorities. People Recruit the ‚ÄòBest in Class‚Äô sale associates to ensure delivery of ‚ÄòTop Line‚Äô sales. Working alongside GM-HR to deliver targeted people solutions to enhance employee engagement and compliance to HR policies and local legislation. Coach and mentor all store managers and ensure robust succession and training plans are in place for each store. Evaluate and develop all high potential employees. Act as a role model for the Al-Futtaim Way and brand specific behaviors. Business Growth & New Markets Managing market entry and store opening projects with corporate and principal provided resources, ensuring compliance to legislation and brand requirements. Responsible for all strategic operational plans including new territories. Qualification Minimum Qualifications and Knowledge: College or University level graduate. Minimum Experience: Retail fashion experience is preferred although a passion for fashion is a MUST. Job-Specific Skills: Strategic planning and analytical skills, All Microsoft Office Programs. Behavioral Competencies : Strong communication skills, confident decision maker, leadership skills and strategic thinker. Keeps up to date with the latest trends and brands, Strong sales focus and eager to learn.

Adfinity Co., Ltd. - Phrom Phong, Bangkok, Thailand Adfinity is a leading marketing agency providing comprehensive digital marketing services with a focus on driving performance and growth for our clients. We specialise in social media management, influencer marketing, online advertising, and more. We‚Äôre looking for a highly skilled and creative Graphic Designer to join our team to create graphical content for our client‚Äôs marketing campaigns. You will play a vital role in conveying our clients' visions into visually compelling assets that captivate audiences. Responsibilities: Collaborate with the client success, paid media and social media teams to understand project objectives, target audience, and brand guidelines in order to create visually appealing designs for various platforms and campaigns. Create visually stunning and cohesive designs that effectively communicate the intended message and align with the brand's identity and values. Use industry-standard design software and tools to produce high-quality graphics, ensuring accurate colors, typography, and layout. Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, techniques, and best practices to continually enhance the quality and creativity of our designs. Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet project deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Incorporate feedback from clients and team members to iterate and improve designs based on their input. Maintain organized file management systems and archives to ensure efficient retrieval and future use of design assets. Monitor and analyze the performance of your designs to identify areas of improvement and optimize future campaigns. Qualifications: Exceptional design skills, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to adapt styles to different target audiences. Proven work experience as a Graphic Designer, or similar role in a digital marketing agency or related field. A strong portfolio showcasing a diverse range of creative and visually appealing design samples across various platforms. Proficiency in industry-standard design software and tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Ability to work independently and with a team to meet deadlines. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits. An opportunity to grow with a leading online marketing agency. Ongoing training and development opportunities. Hybrid working environment. Adfinity is an Equal Opportunity Employer and encourages applicants of all ages, experiences, and backgrounds to apply.

As graphic designer in our fast-paced marketing department, you‚Äôll be working with market-leading digital marketing and e-commerce expert teams at GQ Apparel Thailand across the company both in Thailand and the in United States (schoolmaskpack.com) to build market-leading capabilities. We want people who are hungry to scale both our businesses¬†and themselves! We are looking for top talent that has an entrepreneurial spirit, loves to take risks, and always push the boundaries in their daily life to drive WOW innovation, WOW marketing, and WOW solutions for consumers. We want someone who is passionate, flexible, and forward-thinking with a willingness to try new tools and learn new skills to keep up with the trends in the ever-changing digital landscape. Responsibilities : 1.Create Visually Engaging Content¬†for social media, e-commerce platforms, digital advertising, and all our touchpoints. 2.Branding Hero:¬†Help develop/maintain brand guidelines and a strong brand identity 3.Digital Marketing: Utilize data and engagement to continue to optimize the creatives you make using the latest learnings and market trends. 4.Leading Edge Design:¬†make creatives that WOW audiences in new, shocking and sometimes unusual ways. Take initiative to push us to the next level and into arenas of what‚Äôs next (augmented reality? stickers and effects? endless possibilities!) Requirements : -Proven graphic design experience, Adobe Indesign Photoshop and After Effects is a plus -A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics -Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, Photoshop) -A keen eye for aesthetics and details -Excellent communication skills -Ability to work quickly and meet deadlines -Degree in Design, Fine Arts or related field is a plus Work Location : MRT Hua Lamphong (Exit 3) *** Please attach your portfolio to apply for this position Graphic Designer ***

Create appealing and eye-catching visual displays that lead the customer through the entire store. Produce window displays, signs, interior displays, floor plans and special promotions displays. Identify key messages and set a clear image of the end result. Come up with, revise and present design ideas with assistant merchandisers. Act in alignment to the organization‚Äôs culture, products, image and target market. Monitor costs and work within budget. Oversee the production and brief staff on arranging displays. Change displays to promote new product launches and reflect festive or seasonal themes. Liaise with suppliers and source elements. Research lifestyle, demographics and design trends. Qualification: BS degree in visual merchandising, fashion merchandising, exhibition design, visual communications or similar. Proven work experience as a Store Design, Visual Designer or Visual Merchandiser. 3 years+ experience in visual merchandising Cosmetic, Beauty or fashion business. Demonstrable visual design skills with a strong retail merchandising portfolio. Solid experience in field visual merchandising, including window displays, signs, interior displays and space utilization. Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator, or other visual design tools. Knowledge of current visual merchandising trends and best practices. Proficiency in MS Office. Creative and innovative thinker. Ability to analyze sales merchandising reports and survey results.

Position: Creative Multimedia Specialist Join our dynamic team at Sennex, a leading international corporate interior design & construction company at the forefront of innovation in Workplace Design. We are seeking a highly talented and creative Multimedia Specialist to elevate our Regional Marketing efforts through captivating design and engaging multimedia content. If you have a passion for visual storytelling, possess a keen eye for detail, and thrive in a collaborative environment, this is the opportunity for you. Location: Bangkok Responsibilities: As a Creative Multimedia Specialist, you will be responsible for Design and Development: Create visually stunning digital brochures, presentations, and videos for client pitches using tools such as PowerPoint, Adobe Creative Suite, and other relevant multimedia platforms. Translate complex concepts into compelling and visually appealing multimedia content. Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing and sales teams to understand project requirements and objectives. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive and consistent brand representation across all multimedia materials. Innovation: Stay updated on industry trends and emerging multimedia technologies. Bring innovative ideas and concepts to the table, pushing creative boundaries to differentiate our brand in the market. Quality Assurance: Ensure all multimedia content meets the highest standards of quality, accuracy, and brand consistency. Conduct thorough reviews to identify and resolve any issues in design or functionality. Qualifications: Proven experience as a Multimedia Specialist, Graphic Designer, or similar role. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. Strong command of multimedia tools, including PowerPoint and other relevant presentation software. Demonstrated portfolio showcasing a range of multimedia projects. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication skills and attention to detail. Education and Experience: Degree or Diploma in Multimedia Design, Graphic Design, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of experience in multimedia design. If you are a highly creative individual with a passion for multimedia design, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience Sennex Design & Construction Company is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

SEED is seeking Architects & Interior Designers of all levels to join its growing practice in Bangkok, Thailand. About SEED SEED is a boutique international design practice based in Singapore, Bangkok and Milan. We work on a wide range of projects spanning from interiors to architecture and planning. Our passion is to envision, design and develop unique projects of exceptional quality. We promote a collaborative and collective design process and we are now looking to expand our core team to take care of a raising number of projects in South-East Asia. Check out our website www.seed-design.co or our instagram page _seed_design_ to know more! Opportunities Hands-on in a wide range of bespoke projects, locally and overseas Flexible work arrangement (hybrid work) with informal and collaborative working environment Exceptional office location in downtown Bangkok Boutique office set up with little hierarchy Working with a young and upcoming firm with great potential of personal and professional growth Learning opportunities to upgrade design and technical skills with the use of the latest digital tools Promoting a sense of authorship and purpose in every project Job Responsibilities Designer-in-charge from Concept to Detail Design and Project Delivery Study models, preliminary proposals, case studies, analysis and all kind of research work at project‚Äôs inception Preparing presentations to clients Developing detail drawings and producing technical drawings sets for tender and construction Liaising with suppliers, consultants and contractors to ensure proper coordination and delivery of the project Respond to Contractor‚Äôs request for information and review/comment shop drawings Qualifications & Skills Min 3 years of working experience for junior positions Min 7 years of working experience for senior positions Degree in Architecture or Interior Design from a reputable institution Strong conceptual design and presentation skills Good command of technical drawings and knowledge of detailing Ability to read and correctly interpret mechanical, electrical, structural drawings and other consultants‚Äô drawings Proficiency in AutoCad, Sketch-up, Adobe Suite, Excel, Enscape/Twinmotion/other real time rendering engines, Revit/BIM a plus, knowledge of AI models a plus Fluent in written and spoken English Excellent communication skills Team player and strongly motivated to excel in the field of expected salary and your availability Copy of educational certificates Character reference letters (if any)

Jobtitle: R&D Power Electronics Engineer / Senior ‚Äì Automotive Business Unit (Bangpoo)
column8: Click like and follow our career page on facebook Delta Careers Thailand (facebook.com) Job Summary: Power electronics engineer is responsible for assisting in developing power converter hardware (AC/DC, DC/DC) for automotive application. Candidate will have opportunity to work closely with well-known European or US EV makers. Your main role is to: Perform power stage/circuit calculation & design, circuit simulation, stability analysis and all active/passive component selection. Troubleshoot power converter including technical documentation‡πÉ Collaborate with digital control engineer, magnetics engineer, mechanical engineer, thermal engineer, FW engineer to ensure design success until reliably manufacturing. Who are we looking for? Bachelor Degree in Electrical Engineering with good circuit analysis skill, preferred Master‚Äôs Degree or PhD in power electronics industry. Experienced from automotive industry is a plus. Strong technical background in the field of: Circuit Analysis, Power Converter, Control theory Basic digital circuit Troubleshooting & analyzing technical problem. Verbal and written communications skills in English. Able to travel oversees to Europe, China. Professional working attitude, high responsibility and good teamwork, Eager to learn new things & technology most important. Top reasons for why join us? Opportunity to join a diverse and international company where can help create a greener more intelligence-driven future. A number of programs each year to support you in your career journey and our program offering continues to grow annually. Balance life as we have 5-day work week policy. We offer comprehensive medical insurance coverage for you and your family. Yearly bonus and¬†quarterly incentive to reward your achievements. We provide a free bus and van shuttle service to many locations around the company. For more details about¬†Delta Electronics¬†please visit¬†www.deltathailand.com

Overview We are looking for graphic designers to join our in-house team. You may be a digital native with an interest in social media and motion graphics, or a creative all-rounder. Either way, you will have a great creative eye, are comfortable working both independently as well as part of a team, and importantly, have an interest in fashion and design trends. You will be working on some of Australia‚Äôs most iconic fashion brands ‚Äì Bonds, Berlei and Jockey , as well as international streetwear brand Champion . You will be part of newly established team graphic designers located in Bangkok and will work as part of a bigger design and marketing team based in Australia. You will be brimming with fresh ideas and have great typography skills, have an eye for composition and layout and are comfortable adhering to the style guides of multiple brands at a time. Previous experience working for a retailer is preferred, but not essential. Primary Responsibilities/Accountabilities Reporting into the Lead Graphic Designer (based in Bangkok), these roles involve the concepting and delivery of high-quality graphic designs across a wide range of on and offline channels, including: ‚Äì¬†¬† Static digital artwork for website, emails, display, organic and paid social advertising ‚Äì¬†¬† Impactful animated content, GIFs and motion graphics ‚Äì¬†¬† Mastery of After Effects and Figma ‚Äì¬†¬† Mastery of Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Keynote and Indesign) ‚Äì¬†¬† Highly creative with branding experience ‚Äì¬†¬† Packaging ‚Äì¬†¬† Printed window displays, point of Sale and other printed in-store collateral ‚Äì¬†¬† Good knowledge of POSM and retail channel industry You will be required to both develop your own unique concepts for some briefs, as well as take existing concepts from our agency partners and adapt them for our brands‚Äô owned channels. Sometimes you will lead jobs and briefs autonomously, and other times you may be working collaboratively with other team members (both in Bangkok and Australia) to bring a campaign to life or deliver a major project. Regardless of what channel you‚Äôre working on, you will have a great sense of design and composition with a strong eye for layout and appreciation of brand guidelines. Strong typographic skills is a must! You are also someone that keeps up to date with trends and best practicesn and knows how and when to use these in your work. You will be comfortable juggling multiple briefs from our brand, retail and digital marketing teams, and confident in presenting back your ideas, with rationale provided for design choices to demonstrate how you‚Äôre meeting the brief. You will be open and receptive to feedback, and solution oriented where needed. Qualifications Strong attention to detail Minimum 3 years experience Great communication skills Ability to multi-task, juggling a variety of projects and brands at the same time Ability to work both independently, and part of a team A good working knowledge of UX, online and offline production, motion, social and content. Have a flair for designing visually appealing and attractive collateral Fluent in English with good storytelling skills Passionate about fashion, brand identity and design Proficiency with The Adobe Suite Creative Cloud, Figma Experience with After Effects or any other video software a bonus

Job Descriptions: We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer to join our Products Development team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs that communicate our brand message effectively. From concept to execution, the Graphic Designer will collaborate with the marketing team to produce various design assets for digital and print media. UI Designer will be responsible for creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for our digital products. This role involves collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to design user-centric interfaces that enhance user experience and align with our brand guidelines. ‚Ä¢ Conceptualize and design marketing materials such as banners, brochures, social media graphics, and advertisements. ‚Ä¢ Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with UX designers, product managers, and developers to understand user needs and translate them into functional designs. ‚Ä¢ Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups to illustrate design ideas and user interactions. ‚Ä¢ Maintain brand consistency across all platforms and campaigns. ‚Ä¢ Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative design techniques. Requirements: ‚Ä¢ Proven experience as a Graphic Designer / UI Designer or similar role. ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma. ‚Ä¢ Strong portfolio showcasing creative designs and projects. ‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and collaboration skills. ‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. ‚Ä¢ Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and design standards in UI/UX. He/she is responsible for managing product development process as well as being a bridge with Japan and China to chare products, technologies, information and resources. Job Location : Rangsit, Thailand Key Success Factors Team player and team spirit With good initiative and proactive Can work independently, dependable Speed to action and good implementation Good analytical skills Expertise in using design graphics software Overview of Functions and Responsibilities Main focus of function is on conceiving new designs and the preparation of packaging for new VC products, installation manuals and templates that will conform to standards, cost and timeline for new product launch while exercising the commonalities of designs, format and maintaining the standardization scheme for cost economics. Preparation of installation manuals for new VC products including review for existing products to maintain the approved standard format in Thailand and across the region. Details of Job Responsibilities Prepares packaging designs, installation manuals, templates and their artworks for new VC products, review them with superiors prior to actual execution while ensuring that commonality scheme is followed. Coordinates with Customer Care teams for the verification of the installation procedure and secure their concurrence prior to finalization of the manual. Coordinates with Purchasing team for all related cost of the new packaging and get final agreement from all concerned. Prepares related information of the new products and fully coordinates with Mfg on actual product testing of the packaging. Identify, verify and evaluates existing packaging that can be used as common design for new product to maintain the standardization objectives and for cost economics. Coordinates with QA for the reliability test result of the new carton packaging, secure results. Investigate and find out all existing carton design, packing method and reliability testing. Ensure that they comply with country standards, specifications and tolerance. Creates prototypes models for evaluating new concepts, demonstrates feasibility and reduce risk. Support other teams including the region for any data or document they need in relation to packaging, templates and installation manuals. Initiates new idea for packaging, materials, usage, cost savings and quality Perform FMEA for packaging designs and installation procedure. Ensures that approved packaging designs, templates and installation manuals are registered in the system through DCC (Document Control Center) Requirements With at least 3 years in experience working with packaging companies or related with sanitary wares business Graduate of any engineering field or Fine Arts, Architecture with major on ceramic designs. Knowledge in ceramics or sanitary wares is a plus point. Good command of English, conversational and writing skills Computer literate on MS office and knowledgeable on using Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Rhinoceros and other related graphic software. Knowledge in ACAD, Pro-E is a plus factor

Design skills: ability to sketch and being able to proceed the presentation. Communication skills in English. Thai ‚Äì English is acceptable. Resumes in English language only will be accepted. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Creative thinking and problem-solving skills. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and work independently. Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to delivering high-quality design work. Eagerness to learn and stay updated on design trends and tools.

Jobtitle: Associate Manager- Global Projects and Specifications
column8: In this position, you will report to the Associate Director, Global Projects & Specifications, SEA/Thailand, who will provide guidance and support in achieving our collective goals. Role and Responsibility Brand Ambassador : Promote the Kohler brand and products as an industry expert and win on strategic product categories. Ability to represent the Kohler brand with sophistication and conviction to business partners professionally. Relationship Building : Develop and maintain strong, strategic relationships with key customers, including cross-region developers, architects, interior designers, and hotel operators. Specification Recommendations : Understand customer needs and recommend Kohler Kitchen and Bath products for inclusion in their projects. Leverage your design background and aesthetic sense to provide expert advice and technical support in product selection. Market Expansion : Identify and pursue opportunities for market expansion, both locally and internationally, aligning with the company‚Äôs overall strategic plans. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create tailored solutions for customers. Project Communicator : Collaborate with customers, internal teams, and partners to support the execution of projects, ensuring well-considered proposal delivery on-time and close follow through to completion. Advocate Conversion : Work closely with key customers to transform them into advocates and loyalists, promoting long-term partnerships. Project Acquisition : Identify and secure international projects through engagement with developers, architects, and interior designers. Act as the primary point of contact for project stakeholders. Qualifications Bachelor's Degree or higher degree in architectural or design-related field preferred. Proven experience working in design firms and/or key account management, or specification sales, preferably in the sanitary fittings/wares or luxury products industry. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, conversant in working cross-culturally. Possess/acquire excellent product knowledge and be able to speak in the language of international caliber designers. Self-driven, self-disciplined, and goal-oriented Strategic thinking, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities. Proficiency in the Salesforce will be an advantage. Existing network base with B2B designers preferred. Strong verbal and written communication and presentation skills in English and Thai with Putonghua will be plus point. All applications will be treated strictly confidential. We offer attractive remuneration packages and extensive career opportunities and training to the successful candidates. column8: Major responsibilities: UX Design: Create wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes for new products or features, iterating based on user feedback and research findings. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and stakeholders, to ensure designs meet user needs and align with the business objectives. Test and validate designs to identify areas for improvement and optimize user experiences. UI Design: Develop visually appealing and user-friendly interface designs, ensuring consistency in colors, typography, and design elements. Create and maintain a design system, including reusable components, UI patterns, and style guides. Collaborate with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately and perform usability testing to validate the final product. Innovation and Creativity: Stay up to date with design trends, technologies, and tools. Actively participate in brainstorming sessions and workshops to generate creative ideas and concepts. Propose and develop innovative design solutions that align with the strategic direction of the Innovation Center. Contribute to all stages of the design process from user research to wireframes and shipping the product.

Scope of work: As a senior UI designer at Socket 9, you will lead the design of user interfaces for a variety of software products. This includes collaborating with cross-functional teams, mentoring junior designers, creating, and maintaining design systems, and communicating with stakeholders. You may also can conduct usability testing to gather feedback and insights from users. You will be responsible for managing your time and solving design challenges. In this role, you will have the opportunity to advance your career at your own pace while making a meaningful contribution to the success of our company's software products. Duties and Responsibilities: Lead the UI design process, collaborate with cross-functional teams including UX designers, developers, and product managers to ensure alignment with project needs and goals. Mentor junior designers, providing timely feedback and support. Work closely with developers to refine and implement UI designs, assisting in problem-solving and creativity to overcome design challenges. Establish and maintain design systems and style guides to guarantee consistent user interface across the software. Communicate effectively with both design and non-design teams, confidently presenting and justifying design decisions to stakeholders and clients. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer interface design or a related field. Minimum 4years‚Äô experience in UI design, with a focus on senior-level roles. Experience supervising a team of designers. Expert proficiency in using Figma or Adobe XD. Strong understanding of UI industry standards and fundamentals. Excellent creative problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box.

MTMDESIGN is looking for talented interior designers or architects with interior design experience to join our team. WHO WE ARE? MTMDESIGN is young international design firm based in Bangkok and Shanghai. We are focused in high-end interior design projects for international and local clients. We are a small creative team that provides tailor made solutions for our clients. We work mostly in food & beverage, commercial projects. We are currently working in projects in China, Manila, Thailand and Vietnam. WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR? Young talented and passionate interior designers or architects interested in working in cool interior design projects. Role for Junior: Support director into developing cool projects. Sketch Up and Vray/Lumion projects studies and visualization. Source and deal with furniture, decoration and lighting suppliers. Research for new projects. Assist director during site visits. Role for¬†Intermediate: Work on interior design projects with director. Create presentations for clients. Develop projects documentation together with team. Sketch Up and Vray/Lumion projects and visualization. Research for new projects. Site visits. Language: Local Thai Speaking with good level of English Studies: Interior design or architecture degrees. Work experience: Minimum of 1-5 year working on interior design projects. Software: Proficiency in Autocad and Photoshop Good level of 3DMAX or SketchUp with VRay Rendering and MS Office. Presentation skills WHAT CAN WE OFFER? Work in cool interior design projects in collaboration with an experienced team. Collaboration in projects from concept to construction drawings and construction site supervision. We are a small company, so we all do a little bit of everything Carry on with your own project under director supervision. Good working environment. We are in a nice spacious studio in a newly renovated house. Central office location (Ekkamai) International ambiance (Design director is from Barcelona with fifteen years of experience in Asia) Reasonable working hours Salary: TBC based on candidate skills and experience. MTMDESIGN www.MTMDESIGN.co If you feel that is something interesting for you, please send your resume and portfolio in English to us.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES The Product Improvement Engineer will be part of global R&D and report directly to The Technical service and Product improvement Manager. Product improvement engineer will provide engineering capability to support the continual improvement of Datamars global products, across all Datamars product lines (LMS, AHDS, TID and PID). The person will work on both electrical and mechanical in term of product improvement and development. An experience with RFID products would be ideal fit. MAIN DUTIES Responsible for the following tasks: Provide engineering support to improve existing components and products and participate in product technical feasibilities and assessment during new product development. Participate in project teams to support the development or relocation of Datamars global products, with a focus on electronic aspects (RFID and/or PCBA components and products). Build and validate samples of Datamars global products. Manage product testing and validation during product development phases, and support the local engineering team for the industrialization of the product, by working as the local coordinator in Thailand between the product development resources in other Datamars R&D global subsidiaries (Switzerland or New Zealand) and the engineering team in Datamars Thailand. Participate and support the different phases of the product improvement, in particular for product design freeze and industrialization to coordinate the activities with NPD teams and define the best manufacturing process and setup. Support NPD teams during product development for all aspects related to design, testing and validation and review Test Plan protocols to make them more robust and aligned with use cases and failure modes observed in the field. Review and manage components and product specification updates including the review of inspection and test methods. Create and/or review test plan prior to start with new component evalaution. Provide product-related technical support to Datamars supply chain, production, and quality assurance functions. Provide a test report of the validation of component or product samples according to an agreed test plan. Document the results of other engineering activities including the timely updating of records. Manage deadlines and keep all relevant parties informed of progress and issues. Proactively raise issues and or delays that can impact the project timeline. Provide technical support to the R&D global team and/or procurement or supply chain on discussions with electronics suppliers, such as PCBA makers, or dry/wet inlays suppliers, and/or IC packaging companies. Support the R&D team in identifying new or alternative suppliers for electronic components, PCBA, inlays, or IC packages. Other duties which fit within the scope of this position, and as directed by your manager. Time Management & Communication Report verbally to the Manager, Technical Services, and Product Improvement daily. Provide formal reports when required. Intellectual Property and Confidentiality Exercise discretion when disclosing customer and Datamars product-related information and follow the requirements specified in the Individual Employment Agreement.¬† This is to ensure that product design and other sensitive information is not inappropriately divulged, and that competitive intellectual property advantage is maintained by the company. Health & Safety Support and adhere to company safety and health policies and procedures. Promote a safe and environmentally sound working environment and a culture of safe and responsible behavior and attitude. Take all practicable steps to ensure your own safety and that of your colleagues at work, Ensure that your actions (or inactions) do not cause harm to any other person, Wear and/or use the PPE provided by the company Report accidents or near-misses, and Report new hazards. Other Duties Other duties which fit within the scope of this position, and as directed by your manager. REQUIREMENTS Mechanical engineering bachelor‚Äôs degree or any related field. Be an effective communicator with very good verbal and written English skills. Have experience with injection moulding technology and plastic component. Have experience with portable devices which include electronics. Experience with RFID products is a plus. Have problem-solving skills and understand the principles of root cause analysis. Have exceptional attention to detail. Have experience using measuring tools and equipment. Have experience with drafting and tolerancing of machined components is a plus Have an initiative-taking attitude, proactive and be a motivated person who is curious and willing to look for ways to be more efficient to improve Datamars processes.

column8: Responsibilities: Develop visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including UX designers, developers, and product managers, to understand project requirements and user needs. Create and iterate on design concepts, wireframes, and prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas. Execute high-quality visual designs, considering branding guidelines and ensuring a consistent user experience across all platforms. Stay updated on design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to enhance design processes and outcomes. Conduct usability testing and gather user feedback to make informed design decisions. Maintain a strong understanding of design principles, color theory, and typography to produce visually cohesive and engaging interfaces. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, Digital media, Graphic design, or a related field is preferred. At least 3-5 years experience on UI Visual Designer, Graphic Designer Proven experience as a UI visual designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of design projects. Proficient in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, or Figma. Excellent communication skills and the ability to articulate design decisions. Detail-oriented with a keen eye for aesthetics and pixel-perfect designs. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, iterative design environment.

column8: Essential Duties and Responsibilities: Implement all packaging projects as instructed by superior including New products, Changes of Artwork, Core maintenance and Innovation. Work closely with the Marketing in development of new concept and new innovative packaging for the demanding market, maintain and/or improve for current standard of packaging/packing. Work closely with Production, Warehouse and Shipping staff and personnel in devising processes and systems for optimum packing capability, storage capacity and shipping volume. Join our dynamic Digital Marketing Agency as a Junior Graphic Designer, where creativity meets strategy in a fast-paced environment. This role is perfect for those who are passionate about graphic design and eager to contribute to a team's success. You will have the opportunity to collaborate on various digital campaigns, including SEO, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Conversion Optimization, and Web Design. If you're ready to embark on a challenging journey where your design skills will directly impact our growth and client satisfaction, we welcome you to apply. Key Responsibilities: Design Execution: Create compelling visual content for digital campaigns, working closely with the project team to align designs with client objectives and expectations. Collaborative Design Process: Work alongside different teams, contributing your design skills to various projects and ensuring that visual elements are cohesive and effective. Meeting Design Deadlines: Manage your time effectively to meet design deadlines, contributing to the team's overall project management strategy. Use of Design Software: Master design tools and software, keeping up with industry standards and techniques to produce high-quality work. Contribution to Campaign Strategy: Assist in conceptualising visuals for campaign strategies, ensuring your designs align with client goals and campaign ROI. Quality Assurance of Design Work: Ensure the highest quality of design output, participating in reviews and revisions to meet or exceed project standards. Team Collaboration: Work closely with team members, including project managers and the CSM team, to understand and fulfill design requirements. Regular Feedback and Improvement: Seek and respond to feedback on your designs, continuously improving and adapting your work for optimal campaign performance. Reporting on Design Progress: Regularly update senior management and project managers on the progress of design tasks, contributing to the overall project management process. What We're Looking For From You: Creativity and Innovation: Bring fresh, creative ideas to the table, demonstrating a flair for design and a desire to push creative boundaries. Skills and Proficiency: Proficiency in graphic design tools and software. A keen eye for aesthetics and detail, with the ability to translate marketing strategies into compelling visuals. Collaborative Spirit: Work effectively within a team, contributing to a positive and dynamic work environment. Client-Focused Approach: Understand the importance of client objectives in your design work, striving to meet their needs and contribute to their satisfaction. Organisational Skills: Strong time management and organisational abilities, capable of handling multiple design projects simultaneously. Growth and Learning: Eager to learn and grow within the field of graphic design, embracing challenges and opportunities for professional development. Requirements: Experience: Some experience in graphic design, with a portfolio that demonstrates your skills and creativity. Education: Degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field. Growth-Minded: An individual who is passionate about their career in graphic design and eager to contribute to the agency's success through innovative and impactful design work. Please apply via jobsdb and include a cover letter outlining why you are the right candidate for the role. *Please note that we will get in touch with shortlisted candidates only.

Your responsibilities The success candidate will be the part of Local Engineering Team heavily specialized in Power Transformers design covering different countries. Responsible for development of transformer designs- Order design, transformer layouts, accessory selection Optimization of design as per customer specification and standard application, performing design calculations, prepare purchasing drawings. Review designs, participate & conduct internal design concept reviews, conduct customer design review meeting. BOM loading. Product inspection during manufacturing process Your background Bachelor Degree of Mechanical Engineering. >2 years‚Äô experience working in Power Transformers industrial is prefered. Further experience working in Mechanical design for Power Transformers would be advantageous. Able to use Cre-o would be advantageous. Understanding of Power Transformer Mechanical Design would be advantageous. Experience on Microsoft office and tools. Skills: Good communication skills in English Language oral and written form. Ability to speak with and work together with the technical teams in different parts of the world. Demonstrated team building and networking skills, would be a preference. More about us Hitachi Energy is a global technology leader that is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We serve customers in the utility, industry and infrastructure sectors with innovative solutions and services across the value chain. Together with customers and partners, we pioneer technologies and enable the digital transformation required to accelerate the energy transition towards a carbon-neutral future. We are advancing the world‚Äôs energy system to become more sustainable, flexible, and secure whilst balancing social, environmental, and economic value. Hitachi Energy has a proven track record and unparalleled installed base in more than 140 countries. Headquartered in Switzerland, we employ around 38,000 people in 90 countries and generate business volumes of approximately $10 billion USD. www.hitachienergy.com

Job Summary and Mission This position contributes to Starbucks success by being fully committed to the tasks and cross-functional as well as create close work relationship with operations team. Summary of Key Responsibilities Responsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the following: Supervise in photo shooting for creative work. Support cross functional creative work design for manuals, Uniforms, partners tools , etc. Develop and ensure that all elements of the brand presentation in the market are relevant and effective in delivering on the brand proposition and aligned with the global standard. Develop, control and execute the development, design and evolution of store presentations and space management to optimize theme communication and sales opportunity. Continually develop and Initiate new ideas and techniques of design presentation that will complement marketing programs & communication message and introduce them as appropriate to ensure the overall store appealing, interesting and enhancing the brand proposition in-store Develop Product design and packaging to support multi categories; Merchandises: local festive Merch, Merch for specific stores, MSR exclusive/ Food: festive packed food/ Package Coffee: Seasonal coffee gift sets Design the Digital Game pages Support the Digital team Photo shootings of new beverages, foods, coffees, merchandises and promotions for all social channels' posts VDO shooting of LTO for social posting Photo edit using Photoshop to ensure all visuals are presented right according to the key messages and brand Create animations on some visuals to drive attention and engagement on FB posts. Perform such other duties as may be assigned by supervisor Summary of Experience Experience working in Graphic Design 3-5 years Required Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Ability to develop and execute the brand presentation relevant to the market and aligned with the global standard Ability to initiate new ideas and techniques of design presentation that will complement overall marketing program Ability to monitor and analyze the completive activities Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with Starbucks partners at all levels and the general public Ability to present facts and recommendations effectively in oral and written form Ability to maintain strict confidentiality Ability to set priorities and meet deadlines Education Bachelor's Degree of Art, Graphic or Design

We are seeking for a Designer, Architect, Cabinetmaker, Metallurgist, to manage the team and projects to design samples, cases, models, and display. Most of our products are painted, covered with different materials such as acrylic, leather, and aluminum. You will report to Design Manager and you will work with the Headquarter located in Europe. You will ensure the progress with a team, and prepare presentation¬†plans, the research on materials to be used and the quotes. You will be responsible for sample drawing and planning. You will prepare template, technical sheet or worksheet for operation. You will work on the parts manually or with a machine: jointer, router, lathes, mortising machine, and assemble the parts after testing set-up and fixing them with glue, ‚Ä¶ You will ensure the proper finishing process: prepare the wood, sand, paint, lacquer, patina and varnish the product, and install mountings and fittings. You will be required to manage for the achievement of the following missions: Complete technical drawings Order materials Study on price Deliver product on time Control sample quality Follow-up and develop manufacturing process Propose corrective actions for encountered problems Complete and optimize manufacturing costs Run the meeting with your team You will have the mission to train your employees.

column8: Graphic Designer Trident Aviation Services Group Co., Ltd (TASG) is expanding its business into consumer product design and distribution and is looking for energetic and fast learning candidates for a position of Graphic Designer to fulfill the ambitions of our international consumer product business unit. This is the perfect entry level job, for applicant that wants to join a small team, work in a developing career field, and apply their business skills to a job they can grow into a career.¬† The ideal person in this job would be someone who has demonstrated their ability to learn, to create graphics for a variety of media with little to no supervision.¬† As this is rising market sector in South East Asia, this position provides good opportunity for growth within the company. Job Description Take product photos to create visual ad Create media design both online & printing materials according to company‚Äôs guidelines to support marketing activities. Present creative ideas for designing product packaging and write impressive content for products Responsible for scheduling and planning, estimating time required to complete the work Liaise with internal and external parties on a regular basis to ensure the design objective and the deadlines are met. Qualifications Bachelors Diploma or tech degree in graphic design or any related field Good graphic design skills (such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator) Ability to show good sense of aesthetic and creative judgment Positive attitude, ready to learn new things and be a good teamwork player Having knowledge about social media and/or able to create social media adverts will be advantage Ability to communicate in English will be advantage Newly graduates are welcome Benefits and Welfare Salary 15,000 -18,000 THB negotiable based on experience Bonus Health Insurance Social Security Fund Provident Fund No dress code, dress for the occasion Casual atmosphere Work hours from 8 am to 5 pm, no weekends If you interested in the job, please send your CV and previous portfolio to us. 3D Modelling (CAD DESIGNER) Recognized as one of the world‚Äôs leading luxury bath ware brands, Apaiser is an Australian designer and manufacturer of iconic stone baths, stone basins and stone vanity tops crafted from Apaiser Marble¬Æ and featured in world-class hotels, exclusive resorts, and luxury residential bathrooms across the globe. For over 22 years we have supplied unique natural material-based luxury bath ware to discerning clients. Since 2017 Apaiser has been manufacturing in Bangkok and our vision is for our Thai plant to be the genesis of a new era in bathware in Thailand. This role requires someone with a strong understanding of the Construction, Architectural and Design industry nationally.¬† Ideally, you have current and relevant experience as 3D Modelling officer with any construction or architectural product. This role is for a successful candidate's immediate start or as soon as practical. Job Description: General job description for CAD personal Liaise with sales team on New Design concepts & Drawings received. Liaise & Assist Marketing & Retail team with Line or detail drawings. Liaise & review with Project coordinator & Factory Production team especially on New & Customized designs. Review of Sales for Project Name & Feature Accessories required. Assign & maintain Project name & Custom Codes. Ensure individual project file maintenance to the latest revision level. Preparation of 3D, Detail Drawing for submission approval. Ensure drawings are converted to FINAL status upon approval. Ensure New Molds by Standard or Customized design are documented. Maintenance of Drawing filing system in the server. Able to use the Auto CAD and SolidWorks. Able to communicate in English. Other tasks as assigned. Working day: Monday to Friday 08:00 ‚Äì 17:00 Location : Bangna-Trad Road KM.24 (SKH Warehouse) Employment Type : Full-Time

About Serve: Serve Service Solution is an experienced property agent who specializes in renting and selling out condominiums in the Sukhumvit area of Bangkok (BTS route) and providing interior furniture package. Our clients consist of ex-pats and Thai. We are a subsidiary of Noble Development PCL. , a leading real estate developer in Thailand, which sell worldwide properties to Hong Kong and mainland China buyers. More Information: https://serve.co.th/about Serve's Cultures: Result-Oriented Young and Smart Working Processes (Avg. age of staffs is ~30 years old) Friendly, Joyful and goal-oriented Integrity-Based, Fair Decision-Making and Win-Win Strategies Less Hierarchy Team. Communicate directly with manager and director Position Summary: We are looking for an eager¬†Project Management who is looking to excel in their career. The successful candidate should be excellent at managing project timeline , conducting interior package and services to determine necessary adjustments to achieve company target¬†with utilizing business strategy to generate ways and increase revenue by the product and services in online/offline channels. The staff has freedom to propose the suitable & reasonable plan to achieve the target with the team. Working Hours: 5 days/week from 9:30 am to 6.30 pm. Head Office: Noble Remix next to BTS Thonglor. Salary: 20,000 - 26,000 with Health Insurance , Bonus and Transportation Allowance We‚Äôre looking for: Passion for Business Administration, Innovation Management and Business Development Motivated to work in a rapid growth company Bachelor's degree in any related design field. Required at least 2 year of work experience. Google sheet or any other online working platform. Logical thinking skills, Complex problem-solving. Communication skill. Initiative, Open-Minded, Responsible and Matured Excellent leadership and interpersonal skills with the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional Good command of written and spoken English is a plus Experience and knowledge in real estate industry or property agents is a plus Attention to detail and organization skills for honing in on each necessary task Excellent decision-making and problem-solving skills Preferable skill/experience Experience in project management. Work experience in renovation work and construction related with residential and commercial. Nice to have Skill : AutoCAD, SketchUp. What you‚Äôll do: Communicate with other teams to update & report the progress schedule. Responsible for managing small to large scale of assigned tasks. Customer centric and deliver as committed within budget and in a mutually agreed timeline . Communicate, coordinate , and work closely with team to ensure that all materials communicate the same message and are in the same company objective. Keep track & ensure delivery schedule and manage progression on site . Coordinate with vendors to manage the production quality. Other tasks as assigned by management.

ROLE DESCRIPTION (INTERMEDIATE) DESIGNER The Intermediate Designer acts as an AvroKO‚Äôs team member under the direction of the Senior Designer, with limited oversight. The Intermediate Designer is a team member in the design of a project from the definition and delivery of the design, from conceptualization, through development, coordination, documentation and execution in the field. On smaller projects, the intermediate designer may be the lead designer working directly with the Project Manager and / or Principal in Charge. This is a project specific role. The Intermediate Designers core responsibilities are Design As part of the team, prepare complete designs to meet the clients program, quality objectives, project constraints as well as AvroKO‚Äôs brand of design, with limited supervision required. Where required, assume responsibility for complete design of designated portions of the project as directed by the Senior Designer. Deliver presentations based on deliverables set forth in the contract and AvroKO‚Äôs Architectural Standards. Tasks may include, but not be limited to developing designs, 3D modeling, elevation renderings, mood board creation, cad drawings, image research, materials and furniture sourcing, tearsheets, specification pages, sample boards Development As directed by the Senior Designer, lead the team on the development of the whole design of the project according to the design intent and Senior Designer directives. Reviewing documents to ensure they incorporate the design intent. Assist junior designers. Coordination Represent AvroKO and the design in consultant coordination and vendor liaison meetings. As directed by the Senior Designer, lead in design coordination within AvroKO i.e. between architecture, FF&E and graphics, and between Owners consultants and AvroKO. Documentation Primary team member responsible for managing, coordinating, creating and delivering presentations and documentation packages based on AvroKO‚Äôs deliverables standards for presentations and contract documents. Ensure the production and delivery of quality and timely sets of contract documents being drawings, specifications, budgets and reports as proscribed by the contract. Execution Performs construction administration services including Responding to RFI‚Äôs and interpreting the contract documents to ensure the design intent is met. Reviewing submittals, substitutions and field conditions for conformance with design intent. Attending and reporting on field visits. Conducting punch lists reviews Resolving problems and issues that arise during construction. Qualifications Bachelor's Degree in Interior Designer or related fields 4-5 years working experience Good command of written and spoken English Ability to work well in a team environment If this sounds like you and the opportunity of working with a fast-moving, dynamic company excites you, then please send us your recent photo, CV and your portfolio.¬†(Resume in English only) AVROKO CO., LTD 177/1 Bangkok Union Insurance Building, 17th floor Surawongse Road, Suriyawongse, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Tel: 02-108-1777-82 www.avroko.com [link removed]

We are currently recruiting a full-time jewelry CAD designer for our Chiang Mai representative office. We are seeking a talented individual with a minimum of 1 year of experience in jewelry CAD design, proficiency in English, and expert knowledge of Matrix and Rhino software. If you are passionate about jewelry design, possess strong artistic skills, and are ready to take your career to the next level, this position could be perfect for you. Start date December 1rst 2023. The salary offered for this position will be determinate on the candidate‚Äôs level of experience and qualifications. Key Responsibilities: Create detailed 3D jewelry designs using Matrix and Rhino software. Collaborate with our head designer to bring concepts to life. Conduct regular research on industry trends and stay updated with the latest techniques in jewelry CAD design. Requirements: Minimum 1 year of experience in jewelry CAD design. Proficiency in English, both written and verbal, to effectively communicate with the team. Expertise in Matrix and Rhino software is essential. How to Apply: If you meet the above requirements, please submit your resume, portfolio showcasing your CAD designs, and any other relevant materials. We are seeking a creative and talented Fashion Designer to join our team. As a Fashion Designer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our product line. Sample Development: Work closely with the production team to oversee the development of design samples and ensure they meet quality and design standards. Technical Specifications: Prepare detailed technical specifications and production guidelines to facilitate the manufacturing process. About the company: Our client is a prominent furniture manufacturing company based in Thailand, distinguished for its expertise in crafting high-quality products using a variety of materials, including metal, wood, and other innovative materials. Role Summary The Product Development Manager will play a key role in driving the creation and evolution of our office furniture product line. This individual will lead a team of designers, engineers, and project managers in developing new products, improving existing designs, and ensuring that our offerings align with market trends and customer requirements. Product Strategy and Planning: Develop and execute a comprehensive product development strategy in line with company goals and market trends. Conduct market research to identify customer needs, competitor offerings, and emerging industry trends. Team Leadership: Lead and inspire a cross-functional team of designers, engineers, and project managers. Foster a collaborative and innovative team culture focused on delivering high-quality, market-leading products. Product Design and Innovation: Drive the development of new office furniture designs from concept to production, ensuring they meet functional, aesthetic, and cost objectives. Collaborate with the design team to create sketches, prototypes, and 3D models to visualize concepts. Quality Assurance: Implement rigorous testing procedures to ensure the quality and durability of office furniture products. Collaborate with the quality control team to address any issues and continuously improve product quality. Vendor Management: Work closely with suppliers and manufacturers to source materials, negotiate pricing, and ensure timely delivery of components. Evaluate and select vendors based on quality, cost, and reliability. Budget Management: Develop and manage the product development budget, ensuring efficient use of resources and cost-effectiveness. Monitor project expenditures and implement cost-saving measures when necessary. Qualifications: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in industrial design, Engineering, Business, or a related field. Master's degree is a plus. Proven experience in product development within the office furniture or related industry. Strong leadership and team management skills. Exceptional creativity and ability to think outside the box. Solid understanding of manufacturing processes and materials used in furniture production. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines. Proficient in design software and project management tools. If you are passionate about transforming office spaces through innovative furniture solutions and possess the leadership skills to drive a high-performing team, we invite you to apply for this position. For more information and confidential discussion, please contact K Nicha at 093-7197456

column8: Main role and responsibility Generating insights through research with users, staff and stakeholders to shape a holistic view of the total user experience - Analyzing, consolidating, and communicating research findings to stakeholders in order to strategically frame, validate and quantify the problem being solved and help inform the wider strategic roadmap of initiatives Defining key UX and organizational measurements used to track and prove the initiative delivers positive outcomes for both users and the business Designing concept journeys, blueprints, and roadmaps that communicate how the total user experience can be elevated beyond the immediate product or service Leading and facilitating¬† the collective understanding of the end-to-end, front-to-back experience by mapping the orchestration of events at the intersection of technology, business and design Shaping how behind-the-scenes processes and support functions interact with each other and how these impact the design process Embedding design practices within organizations to create a sustainable approach to service the needs of the user Responsible for ensuring that all insights and ideas are consolidated into a holistic product/service vision (e.g in form of a Golden Thread). Research future trends and gather stakeholder expectations and goals. Enable and facilitate co-creation to derive ideas and potential solutions (providing creative methods, collaboration environment, workshop agendas, etc.). Utilize the process of iterative design to understand user interactions and enhance user satisfaction by improving the usability and accessibility provided when interacting with a system, product or service. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise 8+ years experience as UI/UX or services designer Experience in professional consulting areas Bachelor Degree Able to communicate both writing and speaking in English and Thai Experience in design thinking methodologies, human-centered design, or other relevant design frameworks Proficiency in design tools such as Figma or other relevant software Ability to create wireframes, prototypes, user flows and other design artifacts to visualize service concepts and improvements Experience conducting user research, including interviews, surveys, usability testing and other methods to gather insights Ability to analyze complex service ecosystems and identify opportunities for improvement Skill in synthesizing research findings and data to inform design decisions Understanding of banking business and its processes to align service design efforts with broader organizational objectives Experience with design sprints, customer journey mapping and other design thinking techniques Knowledge of coding languages and front-end development can be beneficial for prototyping and collaborating with developers (not mandatory but is a plus)

column8: DIGITAL DESIGNER The Digital Designer lead and produces the design function for the e-commerce and Marketing teams at AIRR Labs. Requirements : Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Fine Arts, Visual Arts, Multimedia, or related field 2yrs experience in agency or design studio Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite Illustration Design is a plus Strong portfolio including static, animated, and mobile work samples Ability to build rapport and collaborate with others within the company and externally Please attach portfolio

Scope of work: As a senior UI designer at Socket 9, you will lead the design of user interfaces for a variety of software products. This includes collaborating with cross-functional teams, mentoring junior designers, creating, and maintaining design systems, and communicating with stakeholders. You may also can conduct usability testing to gather feedback and insights from users. You will be responsible for managing your time and solving design challenges. In this role, you will have the opportunity to advance your career at your own pace while making a meaningful contribution to the success of our company's software products. Duties and Responsibilities: Lead the UI design process, collaborate with cross-functional teams including UX designers, developers, and product managers to ensure alignment with project needs and goals. Mentor junior designers, providing timely feedback and support. Work closely with developers to refine and implement UI designs, assisting in problem-solving and creativity to overcome design challenges. Establish and maintain design systems and style guides to guarantee consistent user interface across the software. Communicate effectively with both design and non-design teams, confidently presenting and justifying design decisions to stakeholders and clients. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer interface design or a related field. Minimum 4years‚Äô experience in UI design, with a focus on senior-level roles. Experience supervising a team of designers. Expert proficiency in using Figma or Adobe XD. Strong understanding of UI industry standards and fundamentals. Excellent creative problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box.

Job role overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Jigs & Fixtures Design Specialist to join our dynamic team. As a specialist in jigs & fixtures design, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the seamless incorporation of new jigs & fixtures into our manufacturing process. Your expertise in jigs & fixtures implementation will contribute to the overall quality, performance, and functionality of our production lines. Duties and Responsibilities: Seeking a detail-oriented Assembly Jigs and Fixture Design Specialist. Design, develop, order and commission efficient assembly jigs and fixtures to enhance productivity and ensure product quality. Utilize CAD software, conduct testing, and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to optimise assembly fixture processes, reduce cycle time, and improve overall quality and reliability. Adhere to all safety protocols and guidelines while working and testing equipment, ensuring a safe and secure workplace for all team members. Undertake and assist with duties as required by your Manager. Key Deliverables: As a Jigs & Fixtures Design Specialist, your deliverables include: Complete fixture design based on component datum and GD&T, to enable assembly of part in a production environment. 3D model and 2D drawing of the highlighting critical dimensions and specifying appropriate materials. Implementation of the jigs and fixture into production environment. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field required. Related education and work experience would also be considered. Proven experience in designing jigs & fixtures for a production environment. Fixture designs must fully accommodate datum systems and geometric tolerances of the components used. The ability to read and interpret component drawings drawn to BS8888. The ability to decipher datum equations from component level and utilise these in fixture design. Thorough working knowledge of AutoDesk Inventor software is essential. Strong knowledge of manufacturing processes, assembly techniques, and quality control standards Strong working knowledge in material selection, finishes, surface treatment, heat treatment processes. Ability to produce fully dimensioned 2D drawings to allow jig inspection upon receipt or by 3rd party. Experience in conducting feasibility studies and risk assessments for fixture design. Attention to detail and ability to work with precision. Strong problem-solving and communication skills needed. Proficient in English language Autonomous working style
