Contribute to the development of the design system and style guide to ensure consistency across products. Manage and prioritize multiple projects to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality designs. Who are looking for? Minimum of 3 years of experience in UI/UX design or a similar field. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and other design software. Strong understanding of typography, color theory, layout, and design principles. Experience with user research, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and collaboration skills. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

Responsibilities Responsible for mobile design strategy and action plan in collaboration with software development team. Identify design problems and come up with sophisticated solutions. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas. Deliver strategic design artifacts and customer/user experience decision related to core and new functions and features including (but not limited to) wireframes, user stories, user journeys/screen flows, and mockups optimized for wide range of mobile banking. Take a user-centered design approach and rapidly test and iterate own design and be responsible for end-to-end UI solution design. Qualifications Bachelor‚Äôs degree in relevant fields with business and IT. Have experience in UI or interactive design of digital products. Familiar with Figma, wireframe or other visual design tools. Experience in designing iOS or Android apps. Be able to communicate design concepts through sketches and wireframes. Have great eye for balanced composition and layouts. Be-proactive, initiative and innovative. Nice to Have Knowledge in Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, or related Work Location: Near Chong Nonsi BTS /¬† Saint Louis BTS (Hybrid Working)

Job Highlights: Oversee the entire project lifecycle, including deal-making, design, budgeting, and construction. Responsibilities: Plan and manage resources, timelines, designs, and quality for each project, ensuring client expectations are met within budget constraints. Generate sales to achieve set goals. Oversee project timelines, budget control, concept and design, and coordination with subcontractors during the construction process. Supervise all aspects of the design process, including concept and design development, budgeting, and construction drawing, in collaboration with the Project Design Leader. Monitor on-site construction and ensure project progress aligns with business policies and schedule planning. Engage in discussions and negotiations with subcontractors and vendors. Inspect and assess the overall work progress of contractors. Manage changes to project scope, schedules, and costs using appropriate verification techniques. Provide regular project status reports and take corrective actions to ensure project progress stays on schedule. Handle budget management, quotations, and Bill of Quantities (BOQ). Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree or higher in Interior Architecture, Decoration, or related fields. Minimum 8 years of total working experience in the Interior Design field. Experience in Project Management within Consulting firms, Interior Design firms, or Construction firms specializing in interior design. Knowledge of Budget Control (BOQ). Ability to thrive under pressure and meet tight deadlines. Proactive thinking and strong analytical skills. Excellent interpersonal skills, including leadership, management, communication, problem-solving, and planning. Outstanding analytical and internal communication skills. Proficiency in English.

TrueMoney is a leading regional payment platform for digital consumers in Thailand and 6 other countries on Southeast Asia. We serve over 30 million people through our e-wallet app and network of 50,000 agents. We are part of the CP Group, Thailand‚Äôs largest private conglomerate. Our investors include Ant Financial (Alibaba Group), who also collaborates with us on technology. The UX Design team leads product design initiatives for TrueMoney Wallet and is responsible for all aspects of the user experience. We are seeking a Product Designer who is passionate about mobile user experience design to create new digital financial products and services. The ideal candidate is a passionate, yet pragmatic designer who can understand customer behaviors, problem-solve creatively, and create world-class experiences within a fast-paced and collaborative environment. You should be comfortable working with cross-functional stakeholders to create complex, customer-focused solutions. Responsibilities Partner with product and business teams to research, design, and prototype new user experiences. Create digital solutions that address customer needs and achieve business objectives. Perform user research to understand user needs and validate proposed solutions. Participate in internal projects to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the UX design team. Qualifications 3+ years of product design experience, with an emphasis on mobile UX design Portfolio available demonstrating a history of delivering quality products, your roles and responsibilities, and the design processes used An understanding of user-centric principles, human-computer interaction, psychology,¬† and usability A talent for articulating ideas and presenting your work Fluency with industry-standard design tools¬†(Sketch, Figma, InVision, Adobe CC) Experience mentoring and upskilling other designers Very comfortable with speaking up, asking questions, and receiving feedback Experience using Design Thinking (or similar design methodology) preferred Able to handle multiple projects and tasks simultaneously

Scope of work : As the Head of Product Design, you will be responsible for leading the product design team and ensuring the creation of exceptional user experiences. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user needs, define product design strategies, and oversee the entire product design process. Your goal will be to drive innovation, deliver high-quality designs, and enhance the overall user experience. Responsibilities : Lead and mentor the product design team. Define and implement product design strategies aligned with business objectives. Apply user-centered design principles to create intuitive and engaging product experiences. Establish and maintain design standards and guidelines for consistency. Collaborate with stakeholders to align design efforts and communicate effectively. Collaborating with HR on recruitment, onboarding, and performance evaluations. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in a related field such as Product Design, Interaction Design, or Visual Design. Or minimum 5 years of experience in product design, with at least 2 years in a¬†leadership role. Strong portfolio demonstrating successful delivery of user-centered designs for digital products. Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite. Knowledge of design systems and design thinking methodologies.

Develop and review design prototypes, perform test and finalize product design to facilitate mass production. Prepare and approve product design and test plans, review design and recommend adequate changes to the approved models before actual role out of new products. Approve prototypes of new designs, conduct performance analysis of prototypes and ensure assemblage of products follow company‚Äôs quality parameters. Design innovative production techniques and provide support to existing ones for new design roll out. Develop new technology and devices to test functionality of new products and manage same in target market. Administer progress of assigned projects to major stakeholders. Document records for all project proposal and associated activities. Solid organizational skills and ability to operate in a fast-paced environment with multiple priorities

Collaborate closely with outsourced design teams to develop and refine interior design plans for our condominium projects, both high-rise and low-rise. About the job As a part of the Store Interior Design team, you use your deep knowledge of people‚Äôs life at home and your high level of home furnishing competence to show many functional, beautiful sustainable and affordable solutions that are relevant to your local market. You also challenge and encourage the many people to see their homes in new ways. Your assignment ‚Ä¢ Contributing to positioning the IKEA store as the first choice for home furnishing in your local market. ‚Ä¢ Applying your home furnishing knowledge to ensure up-to-date room settings and other store media that exceed our visitors‚Äô expectations. ‚Ä¢ Stimulating and increasing the interest for home furnishing through constantly showing new and inspiring solutions that motivate people to visit the IKEA store frequently. ‚Ä¢ Using the richness of the IKEA product range to show distinct and different styles that appeal to many individual tastes and needs. ‚Ä¢ Reflecting the IKEA Brand identity by creating visual impact in all commercial, sales support and co-worker areas. Your profile ‚Ä¢ An education in interior design or architecture. ‚Ä¢ A deep passion, curiosity and understanding of home furnishing and people‚Äôs everyday life at home. ‚Ä¢ Creative thinking supported by commercial visual competence and a keen eye for aesthetics. ‚Ä¢ Actively seeking improved methods of working in a simple, lean and cost-efficient way. ‚Ä¢ Understand interior design and trends that influence GROWING TOGETHER: IKEA offers an exciting and empowering work environment in a global marketplace. As the world‚Äôs leader at life at home, you have exceptional opportunities to grow and develop together with us. Offering Benefits: Salary, Incentive, Company Uniform, IKEA Products' Staff Discount, Gift Voucher for special occasions, Medical benefit (including children), Dental allowance, Insurance (Health/ Life/ Accident), Provident Fund, Annual Leave, etc

Your challenge: The Product Design Lead sets the benchmark for creating rigorous research backed, end-to-end product experiences for customers that are easy to use, employ best-in-class design practices, and are based firmly in customer needs and business goals. They are chief collaborators with the business, technical, and product leaders to understand the vision, objectives, and transformation plans to help identify opportunities for competitive advantage. The Product Design Lead is hands-on, planning and executing core activities such as research, synthesis and design execution, leading a team of product designers to to achieve exceptional customer-centered outcomes Work with the product, business and technology teams to define, scope and manage the end-to-end product experience Manage the design team activities from research and ideation through to execution and ensure consistent high-quality outcomes Guide UX designers on design strategy related to research and insights generation and then execute high quality UX artefacts Guide UI designers on executing best in class visual design work that is consistent, on brand and user backed Work with the front end developers to ensure the successful implementation of the visual design and product interaction Mentor and coach the design teams, specifically with new ways of working and mapping strategy to execution Identify and remove team impediments Work with CPO and POs to align the roadmap to vision and continuous insights to ensure voice of the customer is heard Constantly look for better ways of solving technical problems and designing the solution, not afraid to challenge the status quo Attend events and sessions, promoting customer focus, and being visible at town hall events. Synchronizing customer research and map customer journeys for the constituent across teams Synthesize customer insights across research by each team at the journey level Help define and shape the experience strategy, facilitating work sessions with stakeholders and users to define key design goals and requirements. Requirements: Ability to plan, direct and deliver clear research process and artefacts (e.g., qualitative, quantitative, usability testing, task flows, wireframes, mockups, prototypes and design systems to guide consistency across teams Can make design decisions at a team and product level Experience working on projects that span multiple organizations and business units Significant experience driving design outcomes in an Agile infrastructure, environments, and deployment strategies Seasoned design expertise with deep insight into newest methods, trends, and design operations Experience in Agile Development as a product designer, including tools such as Jira and Confluence Experience managing design priorities within the backlog Understands relationship between Product Owner, Scrum Master, and rest of the team, with a strong sense of design thinking Strong communication skills with ability to align the organization on complex product decisions while advocating the voice of the customer Active coach and mentor whose goals are to grow and maximize the team‚Äôs potential

ROLE DESCRIPTION FURNITURE & LIGHTING DESIGNER 3D MODERLER Company Overview: AvroKO has established a new paradigm in the hospitality industry, encompassing a multitude of disciplines while creating thoughtful and engaging architecture, brands, products, and environments. Since its launch in 2001, AvroKO has earned a reputation as one of the most innovative design firms in the field, due in large part to the group‚Äôs integrated design process and focus on creating emotionally connected experiences. In the past decade, the firm has grown to five offices (New York City, Bangkok, San Francisco, London and Miami) working on projects across 22 countries in 32 cities, launched over a dozen company owned-and-operated restaurants, created a furniture and lighting company (Goodshop), and developed a separate branding and strategy division dedicated to projects of scale (Brand Bureau). We are seeking a skilled and creative 3D Modeler to join our growing design team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge furniture and lighting products. Position Overview: As a Furniture and Lighting Design 3D Modeler, you will play a crucial role in translating design concepts into detailed and visually stunning 3D models. Working closely with our furniture and lighting teams, you will be responsible for creating accurate and visually appealing models that align with our design vision and meet industry standards. Responsibilities: 3D Modeling: - Create detailed 3D models of furniture and lighting designs using industry-standard software(E.g., Rhinoceros, Sketchup, Solidworks). - Ensure accuracy in dimensions, proportions, and materials. Collaboration: - Collaborate with designers to understand design concepts and project requirements. - Participate in design reviews and provide input on feasibility and manufacturability. Innovation: - Contribute to the innovation of new design concepts through 3D modeling techniques. - Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative ideas into designs. Problem Solving: - Address design challenges and propose solutions to enhance functionality and aesthetics. - Work closely with the design team to refine and improve designs based on feedback. Efficiency and Time Management: - Manage workload efficiently to meet project deadlines. - Prioritize tasks and communicate effectively with team members to ensure smooth project flow. Qualifications: - Proven experience as a 3D Modeler, preferably in the furniture and lighting design industry. - Proficiency in 3D modeling software (E.g., Rhinoceros, Sketchup, Solidworks). - Strong understanding of design principles and attention to detail. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. - Ability to adapt to evolving design concepts and project requirements. Education: - Bachelor's degree in Industrial Design, Product Design, or a related field. Additional Skills (Preferred): - Experience with rendering software (e.g., V-Ray). - Knowledge of materials and manufacturing processes in furniture and lighting design. - Familiarity with industry trends and emerging technologies. If this sounds like you and the opportunity of working with a fast-moving, dynamic company excites you, then please send us your recent photo, CV and your portfolio (Resume in English only). AVROKO CO., LTD 177/1 BUI Building, 17th floor, Surawongse Road, Siriyawongse, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 (BTS Chong Nonsi and BTS Saladaeng) Tel: 02-108-1777-82

column8: Job Purpose Senior User Experience Researcher is responsible for leading a UX team in studying and¬†understanding user behaviors, needs, and preferences in order to create intuitive and engaging¬†digital experiences. They combine research, analysis, and design principles to optimize the¬†usability and user satisfaction of a product or service. Responsibilities 1) User Research: Conduct user research activities such as interviews, surveys, and usability testing together insights into user needs, goals, and behaviors. 2) Data Analysis: Analyze and interpret qualitative and quantitative data collected during user research to identify patterns, trends, and user pain points. 3) User Personas: Develop user personas that represent the target audience, incorporating demographic ,behavioral, and attitudinal characteristics. 4) Information Architecture: Create and refine the information architecture of digital products or services ,ensuring logical and intuitive navigation and organization. 5) Wireframing and Prototyping: Design wireframes, interactive prototypes, and mockups to communicate design concepts and validate user flows and interactions. 6) Usability Testing: Plan and conduct usability testing sessions to evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of product designs, identifying areas for improvement. 7) Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, developers, product managers, and stakeholders to ensure user-centered design approaches and align on project goals. 8) Iterative Design: Iterate on designs based on user feedback and testing results, continuously improving the user experience throughout the development lifecycle. 9) Accessibility: Advocate for and integrate accessibility considerations into the design process, ensuring products are usable by individuals with disabilities. 10) Industry Research: Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, UX methodologies, and emerging technologies to inform design decisions and enhance user experiences. Qualification -¬†Strong knowledge of UX research methods, including user interviews, usability testing, and surveys. -¬†Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma for wireframing and prototyping. Analytical mindset with the ability to derive meaningful insights from user data.¬† ¬† ¬† -¬†Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate and present findings to diverse stakeholders. Familiarity with front-end development principles and constraints is beneficial. -¬†Understanding of accessibility guidelines and best practices. - Attention to detail and a passion for creating exceptional user experiences. - Prior experience in financial industry or with financial products will be given special consideration. ******************************************************** All applications will be treated in strict confidence. All material submitted in connection with your application will become part of our confidential recruitment files. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Job Title: Graphic Designer (Educational Materials & Digital Media) Job Overview: We are looking for an innovative Graphic Designer to create visually compelling and educationally effective materials. The role entails designing and laying out educational content, as well as producing dynamic graphics for digital platforms, ensuring all designs align with our educational goals and brand identity. Key Responsibilities: Educational Material Design and Layout: Design visually engaging and pedagogically sound layouts for a variety of educational materials, including textbooks, workbooks, e-learning modules, and interactive PDFs. Apply instructional design principles to create graphic representations of complex concepts, facilitating easier understanding for diverse learning styles. Collaborate with subject matter experts to accurately depict educational content through infographics, diagrams, and illustrative graphics. Digital Media and Online Content Creation: Design compelling graphics for social media campaigns, ensuring they are optimized for different platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.). Create web graphics and banners, aligning with the latest web design standards and user experience best practices. Develop email marketing templates and graphics that are both visually appealing and aligned with messaging objectives. Visual Brand Identity Maintenance: Uphold and evolve the company‚Äôs visual brand identity across all graphic outputs. Create and update design templates and standards to ensure consistency in visual communications. Interdepartmental Collaboration and Project Coordination: Actively participate in cross-functional teams, providing creative input and graphic solutions to meet various departmental needs. Efficiently manage design projects from conception to delivery, coordinating with internal teams and external vendors as needed. Creative Conceptualization and Ideation: Stay ahead of design trends, particularly in the education and tech sectors, and incorporate innovative design ideas into projects. Lead creative brainstorming sessions to generate fresh ideas for new projects or campaigns. Quality Control and Revision Management: Implement quality control measures to ensure all designs meet high standards before final production or publication. Manage the feedback and revision process effectively, making adjustments to designs based on stakeholder input while adhering to deadlines. Professional Development and Industry Engagement: Continuously enhance design skills through professional development opportunities, workshops, or industry events. Engage with the broader design community to stay informed about emerging tools, techniques, and technologies. Digital Asset Organization and Management: Maintain a well-organized digital asset library, categorizing and updating graphic elements, photographs, and design files for efficient retrieval. Oversee the proper archiving of historical design files and assets for reference and compliance. Qualifications: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Graphic Design or a related field. Proven experience in designing and layouting books, worksheets, and creating digital media content. Strong portfolio showcasing a wide range of design skills, particularly in educational material and digital media. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator) and other relevant design software. Ability to work under pressure, meet tight deadlines, and handle multiple projects simultaneously. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Job Descriptions: Participate with other development teams to develop electronic system and hardware for product and development activity, including collaboration in requirements definition, design, prototyping, implementation, test, and deployment. Design, develop, test, and review electronic systems and deliverables of team such as circuit, schematics, PCB, BOM, drawing, Failure Analysis, EQ and DFM documents, work instruction, product compliance test, etc. released to internal and external parties. Establish, conduct, and review the verification plan and process for the designed circuit, PCBA and product. Provide design which supports product modifications, cost reductions, ECN, technology upgrade, etc. Provide and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, or charts. Design, investigate and review basic 2D/3D CAD drawing. Mentor junior engineers on technical skill e.g. Circuit design, PCB/PCBA design and document, experimental design and Failure analysis. Any other duties and responsibilities that may be assigned/extended by management. Qualifications: Master/Bachelor's Degree in Electronic Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering or related field. 3 ‚Äì 5 years experience Experience in electronic circuit design both Analog and Digital as well as control circuits for data acquisition of analog signals. Experience in PCB design using Altium Designer Software. Experience in production processes such as PCBA DFM, fabrication, in-circuit testing, functional testing and failure analysis. Experience in embedded system design (both ARM and PIC MCUs). Have hands-on experience with equipment such as oscilloscope, power supplies, and DMM. Good in both writing and speaking in English. Good analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently with minimum supervision. Team player with good initiative and a never give up mentality. Experience in 2D/3D mechanical drawing using Solidworks or SketchUp is a plus.

column8: Description With thousands of hotels in over 100 countries and territories, Hilton offers countless opportunities to delight. From an open door to a welcoming smile and an exceptional experience, we offer the millions of¬†travellers¬†who stay with us every year a welcome they will never forget. In addition to our flagship brand, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, the family of brands includes Waldorf Astoria, LXR, Conrad, Canopy, Curio Collection, DoubleTree, Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton and many others. If you appreciate the impact global travel can have on the world, you may be just the person we are looking for to work as a Hilton Team Member. Because it‚Äôs with Hilton where we never forget the reason we're here: to delight our guests, Team Members, and owners alike. The Graphic Designer handles promotional videos (pictures, videos, etc.) required by various departments of the hotel and supervises production related to design. This role is responsible for the production of posters, promotional videos, printed materials and other products related to design, ensuring that the products meet the group's design standards, advertising, a deep understanding of the corporate philosophy and culture. What will I be doing? As the Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards: Create and implement hotel promotional materials, merchandising, theme decorations and other project design concepts based on assignment specifications. Design all kinds of photos that can be used for printing and production. Proficient with desktop printing systems. Design and produce logos, banquet posters, banners, background panels and decorations. Receive group standards and ensure that all hotel design works such as hotel brand,¬†colour, specifications and group standards are consistent. Ensure that jobs are scheduled properly, and time management is exercised for art section to meet set deadlines. Create a database of designs, photography, books, references, and standard¬†colours¬†for reference. Ensure the normal operation and maintenance of printing systems. Plan the purchase of art supplies and paper inventory, monitoring paper usage. Maintain books and magazine pictures in design file systems. Manage the hotel image database including official hotel photos and event photos for hotel promotion. Learn and keep updated on creative trends and related information in design work. Keep and economize on all kinds of art tools, materials and equipment. Carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned. The Management reserves the right to make changes to this job description at its sole discretion and without advance notice. Requirements What are we looking for? A Graphic Designer serving Hilton Brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members. To successfully fill this role, you should maintain the attitude,¬†behaviours, skills, and values that follow: Hospitality: We are passionate about delivering exceptional Guest experiences. Integrity: We do the right thing all the time. Leadership: We are leaders in our industry and in our Communities. Teamwork: We are team players in everything we do. Ownership: We are owners of our actions and decisions. Now: We operate with a sense of urgency and discipline. Bachelor‚Äôs degree / Associate degree in graphic design or related field. 3 - 5 years of relevant working experience. Knowledge of printing technology. Master hand-drawn designs. Rich knowledge of design and art. Proficient in Microsoft Office software, computer graphic design, photo processing, printing and editing software. Strong knowledge of graphic design and online marketing. Strong time management skills and able to multitask. What will it be like to work for Hilton? Hilton is the leading global hospitality company, spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels. For nearly a century, Hilton has offered business and leisure¬†travellers¬†the finest in accommodations, service, amenities and value. Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands. Our vision to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day. And, our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all! Posted January 4, 2024
